descriptionEn: Dear friends! This autumn, ARA is planning to organize a literature club for every member and friend of our association üìö The idea of the club is to maintain and practise Russian language skills, meet new people, and hang out in a cozy atmosphere.
The Halloween season is on, and thus it is time for ARA Halloween party! üéÉ Dear friends, we are happy to inform you about the first ARA hangout event of the academic year!
